title: astro-schema index file
description: Index and summary of schema included in `astroschema`.

defs.title: defs
defs.description: Schema specifying definitions used throughout astroschema.

entry.title: entry
entry.description: An item representing a complete catalog entry.

key.title: key
key.description: `Key` objects describe key-value pairs in each entry.

meta-schema.title: meta-schema
meta-schema.description: Core astro-schema meta-schema.  Describes requirements of all other schema.

photometry.title: photometry
photometry.description: An item representing a single photometric data-point.

quantity.title: quantity
quantity.description: An item representing a numerical value.

source.title: source
source.description: An item representing a bibliographic attribution or reference.

spectrum.title: spectrum
spectrum.description: An item representing a single spectrum.
